title: Spicy Oriental lamb salad
time: Takes 10 minutes to make, 10 minutes to cook, plus marinating
description: A budget Asian-style recipe thatâ€™s low in calories and carbohydrates. A quick and healthy option.
ingredients: 1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped

method.Step 1: Marinate the lamb leg steaks in 3 tbsp soy sauce, garlic and sesame oil for 10 minutes.

method.Step 2: Make a dressing with the chilli, lime juice,  2 tbsp soy sauce, Thai fish sauce, sugar and mint.

method.Step 3: Mix handfuls of watercress and pea shoots with the radishes and some cress, and toss with the dressing

method.Step 4: Cook the lamb in a hot frying pan for 3-4 minutes each side until cooked. Finely slice and add to the salad. Serve with bread.
